properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 3:49AM EST until January 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20
knots with gusts up to 30 knots and waves 4 to 7 feet. For the
Gale Warning, northeast winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 35
knots and waves 3 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST this
morning. For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY
